DOC.brief_summary: Whether high-dose omega-3 fatty acid supplement would effective treatment patient major depressive disorder pregnancy breast-feeding .
DOC.brief_title: Omega-3 Fatty Acids Major Depressive Disorder During Pregnancy
DOC.criteria: Eligible participant pregnant woman , age 18 40 year , major depressive disorder onset 16th week ( second trimester ) 32nd week ( third trimester ) gestation Department Obstetrics . Subjects exclude DSMIV diagnosis bipolar disorder , psychotic disorder , substance abuse dependence least 3 month , AxisII diagnosis borderline antisocial personality disorder .
DOC.keyword: Women pregnancy childbirth vulnerable psychiatric disorder
Omega-3 polyunsaturated fatty acid ( PUFAs ) might promise alternative treatment pregnant woman depression .
